message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $110. I know it's worth a lot to me, but I'm hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to offer $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate you trying to find a compromise.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $105. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $100 for the product. This price better aligns with my valuation of the item.
